newsitem.title: USA: Microsoft FY 98 average EPS view up 14 pct.
newsitem.headline: Microsoft FY 98 average EPS view up 14 pct.

text.p: Software industry analysts Friday raised Microsoft Corp earnings estimates by 14 percent on average for the fiscal year that begins July 1, according to First Call research director Chuck Hill.
Hill said 17 analysts raised estimates to an average of $3.10 a share for fiscal 1998, compared with a previous consensus of $2.72.
For fiscal 1997, which ends June 30, the analysts raised estimates to an average $2.62, up from a previous consensus of $2.34.
The analysts acted after Microsoft reported third-quarter earnings that were 23 percent higher than expected.
